keyPolicies.policyDescription: An MP’s most important job is to make sure that people’s views are heard and that they are treated fairly. Will continue to work to ensure that local concerns like crime, housing and social care, as well as matters like flooding and coastal erosion, are addressed and action taken.

Small businesses are the lifeblood of this area, providing jobs and prosperity. A Conservative Government will prioritise policies that promote long term economic stability and invest in our infrastructure.

Helped ensure fairer funding in local schools, and strongly back Boris Johnson’s promise to increase health spending by £33.9billion by 2023. Only a Conservative Government delivering a strong economy can ensure that the NHS and schools are properly funded.
